business_strategies.strategy: Freemium model transition - offer free tier with valuable features while charging for premium features
business_strategies.implementation: Build enough valuable features that customers would be okay paying for, maintain free plan with great starter features
business_strategies.expected_results: Sustainable revenue while maintaining user acquisition
business_strategies.case_study: Agenta moving from completely free to freemium model

business_strategies.strategy: In-house development to reduce customer costs
business_strategies.implementation: Build custom widget instead of using third-party solutions like Voice flow
business_strategies.expected_results: 3-day development vs 2-week timeline, eliminate $50/month customer cost
business_strategies.case_study: Building custom widget to replace Voice flow dependency
